abstract: Who's that girl?--From here to maternity--One bedding and a funeral--The Secret of my excess
description: Episode number 8 of Series "This life". 'Who's that girl?' (dir. Sallie Aprahamian, wri. Annie Caulfield): Anna defends a teacher accused of interfering with a student. Questions arise around Miles' mystery girlfriend, Francesca. Milly becomes upset after hearing Rachel talk about her, leading to an argument with Egg. Kira is late and Miles has a shock announcement. 'From here to maternity' (dir. Sallie Aprahamian, wri. Jimmy Gardner): Egg puts in a bid for the cafe, much to the disappointment of Milly. Kira forces Jo to buy a pregnancy kit, Miles looks for a suitable engagement ring and Ferdy is agitated by the relationship tag with Lenny. Milly takes a risk and Anna suffers a loss. 'One bedding and a funeral' (dir. Joe Ahearne, wri. Jimmy Gardner): Everyone is putting Anna under pressure to attend her mother's funeral. Egg's younger brother comes to stay and learns a few things about women. Kira makes a decision about her future with Jo. 'The Secret of my excess' (dir. Joe Ahearne, wri. William Gaminara): Anna's drinking escalates and her career is in jeopardy after she is caught snorting coke at work. This triggers a binge drinking session that is halted by Miles who is about to question his decision to marry. Milly starts therapy. Cast includes Jack Davenport, Daniella Nardini, Amita Dhiri, Jason Hughes, Andrew Lincoln and Ramon Tikaram.
